com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.document

Class SpenObjectTextBox.TextSpanInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.document.SpenObjectTextBox.TextSpanInfo
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpenObjectTextBox.BackgroundColorSpanInfo, SpenObjectTextBox.BoldStyleSpanInfo, SpenObjectTextBox.FontNameSpanInfo, SpenObjectTextBox.FontSizeSpanInfo, SpenObjectTextBox.ForegroundColorSpanInfo, SpenObjectTextBox.HyperTextStyleSpanInfo, SpenObjectTextBox.ItalicStyleSpanInfo, SpenObjectTextBox.TextDirectionSpanInfo, SpenObjectTextBox.UnderlineStyleSpanInfo
    Enclosing class:
    SpenObjectTextBox

    public static class SpenObjectTextBox.TextSpanInfo
extends Object
    Class for "rich text" format.
    TextSpan class include rich text index and length, font style, font size and so on.
    TextSpan offer various types like below.

    1. TextDirectionSpanInfo - set text writing direction
    2. FontSizeSpanInfo - set font size
    3. FontNameSpanInfo - set font type
    4. ForegroundColorSpanInfo - set text color
    5. BackgroundColorSpanInfo - set text background color
    6. BoldStyleSpanInfo - set text style to bold
    7. ItalicStyleSpanInfo - set text style to italic
    8. UnderlineStyleSpanInfo - set text style to underline
    9. HyperTextStyleSpanInfo - set hyperText
     Here is a sample code. This sample code make underline text.
 
 String string = new("This is underLine text");
 ObjectTextBox text = new ObjectTextBox();
 text.setText(string);
 
 ObjectTextBox.UnderlineStyleSpanInfo[] underLineSpan = new ObjectTextBox.UnderlineStyleSpanInfo[1];
 
 underLineSpan[0] = new UnderlineStyleSpanInfo();
 underLineSpan[0].startPos = 8;
 underLineSpan[0].endPos = 16;
 underLineSpan[0].isUnderline = true;
    Span rich text format.

      End position for text span information.

      static int SPAN_EXCLUSIVE_EXCLUSIVE

      End point span styles are maintained. but not at their start point.

      Start point span styles are maintained. but not at their end point.
      static int SPAN_INCLUSIVE_INCLUSIVE
      Both start/end points span styles are maintained.

      Start position for text span information.

      • startPos

        public int startPos
        Start position for text span information.
        The start position must not have negative value.
